description:
You will need a mite. account

mite.touch brings sleek and easy to use time tracking for freelancers and small teams to webOS.

Manage all your projects, tasks & customers with just a few touches and keep control over your project progress. No need need to log in to the web interface every time you start working. Gain access to your projects in just a few seconds. Or simply add your current jobs on the dashboard to access them even more easily.

Use the integrated mite.touch stop watch to record the time spend on different jobs or enter and edit all values manually.

Live connection to the mite. online service ensures perfect collaboration and up to date information at any time.

Get more information about mite, the sleek online time tracking tool, and register your free trial account at mite.yo.lk/en/
